message.body: ...so I'm guessing that tonight's premiere is a no-go...
Tonight??? Whoa, I'm sorry! Didn't realize tonight was on the table as a premier date!!
Well, you had said 'done by june 1st no matter what'... And I said 'oh cool, we have a show that night'...
I gotta square with you, man: I haven't had NEARLY enough time to work with it over the past week, definitely not as much time as I thought I would've had...
And I'm sorry, I definitely let that coversation fall through a crack somewhere, completely forgot we had said that... oy...
I literally need to spend just a few more hours on it, then it's done. Even today I have some time set aside to work on it...
Yeah...well, um, yeah...shall we say JULY 1st then?
Ok that works. Sorry this is takin forever. As soon as I have another substantially-changed edit I'll upload it. Just know that we're close its only fine-tuning
Ok, let's go with that. JULY FIRST or BUST
